attributes.action: To consider decreasing the costs of secondary school uniforms.
attributes.additional_details:
The school uniforms prices are unreasonable and parents should not have to spend large amounts of money. Several parents have been out of employment for such an extended period of time and still have bills and food to pay. 

There are several of us who are still struggling. 
Now with the children going back to school, many parents are struggling and can not afford to buy school uniforms. 
I think I speak for many parents when I say secondary school uniforms are very expensive.
attributes.background:
I would appreciate the government to please evaluate decreasing prices for secondary school uniforms as they are so expensive.

I myself am a single mum, with a child in secondary education, the informs are certainly expensive. Particularly during these difficult times.

rejection.details:
The cost of school uniforms is set by individual retailers and is not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament.

You may however wish to sign one or more of the following petitions on this issue:

Fund school uniform: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329487

Offer parents free school uniform grants again: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/328190

Prevent schools from requiring uniform bought from specific shops: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332196
